experience.title: Co-Owner
experience.description: FNF is a venture at Institute of Management Technology in Nagpur, which aims to serve quality food and beverages to the students of the college. It not only takes care of the cravings but also satiates the need for entertainment within the campus.

experience.title: Member
experience.description: The Entrepreneurship Cell Committee of IMT, Nagpur aims at fostering creative thinking and nurturing entrepreneurial instincts among students. The Cell hopes to achieve this by conducting workshops, competitions and interactive sessions with eminent personalities who are role models for personal growth and business development.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Performed Technical and Fundamental Analysis on Company Stocks.Created Trading Strategies on Python Programming Language using Technical Indicators.Performed Analysis and Back-Tested Strategies on last 10 years price data of company stocks.

education.title: Institute of Management Technology, Nagpur
education.description: Activities and Societies: Entrepreneurship Cell Committee Member at IMTN. Co-Owner of Frost 'N' Fun Venture at IMTN. IMT Nagpur is an AICTE approved business school and offers postgraduate diploma and executive education programmes in management. The mission of the college is focused on the overall development of the individuals who can serve their organizations, their society and humanity at large with dedication.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Entrepreneurship Cell Committee Member at IMTN. Co-Owner of Frost 'N' Fun Venture at IMTN.

education.title: G. H. Raisoni Institute of Information Technology, Nagpur
education.description: This institute was established in the year 2008. It is An Autonomous Institute Affiliated to Rashtrasant Tukadoji Maharaj Nagpur University, Nagpur. It is recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It is accredited by NAAC with A+ grade with a score of 3.5 in 4 point scale and is a part of the Raisoni Group of Institutions (RGI). It has mad of education enlightening minds and empowering ambitions.
